title: A TRUE STORY, AND THE RECENT CARNIVAL OF CRIME.
description: A modern verbatim reproduction of Mark Twain's little known eighth book, with original decorations and illustrations. "Osgood has added to his increasingly popular Vest Pocket Series . . . 'A True Story' by Mark Twain . . . one of his best." --Hartford Courant, 1877
author: Mark Twain
